trans-unit.source: Entering dates and times in Business Central | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Entering dates and times in Business Central | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Zadávání dat a časů v Business Central | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Learn how to enter dates and times including various productivity tips such as shorthand, expressions and ranges.

seg-source.mrk: Learn how to enter dates and times including various productivity tips such as shorthand, expressions and ranges.

target.mrk: Naučte se, jak zadávat data a časy, včetně různých tipů na produktivitu, jako jsou zkratky, výrazy a rozsahy.

trans-unit.source: Filter lists or reports down to specific date or time periods.

seg-source.mrk: Filter lists or reports down to specific date or time periods.

target.mrk: Filtrujte seznamy nebo sestavy podle konkrétního data nebo časového období.

trans-unit.source: Working with Calendar Dates and Times

seg-source.mrk: Working with Calendar Dates and Times

target.mrk: Práce s daty kalendáře a časy

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] offers multiple ways to enter dates and times, including powerful features that accelerate data entry, or help you write complex calendar expressions.

seg-source.mrk: offers multiple ways to enter dates and times, including powerful features that accelerate data entry, or help you write complex calendar expressions.

target.mrk: nabízí několik způsobů, jak zadávat data a časy, včetně výkonných funkcí, které urychlují zadávání dat, nebo pomáhají psát složité výrazy kalendáře.

trans-unit.source: There are various places throughout the application where you can enter dates and times in fields.

seg-source.mrk: There are various places throughout the application where you can enter dates and times in fields.

target.mrk: V celé aplikaci jsou různá místa, kde můžete do polí zadat data a časy.

trans-unit.source: For example, on a sales order, you can set the shipment date.

seg-source.mrk: For example, on a sales order, you can set the shipment date.

target.mrk: Například u prodejní objednávky můžete nastavit datum odeslání.

trans-unit.source: When filtering lists or report data, you can enter dates and times to pinpoint only the data that you are interested in.

seg-source.mrk: When filtering lists or report data, you can enter dates and times to pinpoint only the data that you are interested in.

target.mrk: Při filtrování seznamů nebo dat sestavy můžete zadat data a časy a vytyčit pouze údaje, které vás zajímají.

trans-unit.source: Check your region and language settings

seg-source.mrk: Check your region and language settings

trans-unit.source: The [**My Settings**](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com?page=9176 "Go directly to your user settings page in Business Central") page specifies the **Region** and **Language** that you are using in the application.

seg-source.mrk: The [**My Settings**](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com?page=9176 "Go directly to your user settings page in Business Central") page specifies the **Region** and **Language** that you are using in the application.

target.mrk: Stránka [**Má nastavení**](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com?page=9176 "Přejděte přímo na stránku uživatelských nastavení v Business Central") specifikuje **Oblast** a **Jazyk** , které používáte v aplikaci.

trans-unit.source: These settings influence how you enter dates and times.

seg-source.mrk: These settings influence how you enter dates and times.

target.mrk: Toto nastavení ovlivňuje způsob zadávání dat a časů.

trans-unit.source: The **Region** setting determines how dates, times, numbers, and currencies are shown or formatted.

seg-source.mrk: The **Region** setting determines how dates, times, numbers, and currencies are shown or formatted.

target.mrk: Nastavení **Oblast** určuje způsob zobrazení nebo formátování dat, časů, čísel a měn.

trans-unit.source: For date patterns that involve words, the language of the words that you use must correspond to the **Language** setting.

seg-source.mrk: For date patterns that involve words, the language of the words that you use must correspond to the **Language** setting.

target.mrk: U vzorů dat, která zahrnují slova, musí jazyk použitých slov odpovídat nastavení **Jazyka**

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] uses the Gregorian calendar system.

seg-source.mrk: uses the Gregorian calendar system.

trans-unit.source: Entering Dates

seg-source.mrk: Entering Dates

trans-unit.source: In a date field, you can enter a date using the standard format for your region setting.

seg-source.mrk: In a date field, you can enter a date using the standard format for your region setting.

target.mrk: Do datového pole můžete zadat datum pomocí standardního formátu pro vaše nastavení regionu.

trans-unit.source: Different regions can use different separators between the days, months and years.

seg-source.mrk: Different regions can use different separators between the days, months and years.

target.mrk: Různé regiony mohou používat různé oddělovače mezi dny, měsíci a lety.

trans-unit.source: For example, some regions use dashes (mm-dd-yyyy) and others use forward slashes (mm/dd/yyyy).

seg-source.mrk: For example, some regions use dashes (mm-dd-yyyy) and others use forward slashes (mm/dd/yyyy).

target.mrk: Například některé regiony používají pomlčky (mm-dd-rrrr) a jiné používají lomítka (mm/dd/rrrr).

trans-unit.source: However, you can use any separators, even a space, and the date will automatically be changed to use separators that match your region.

seg-source.mrk: However, you can use any separators, even a space, and the date will automatically be changed to use separators that match your region.

target.mrk: Můžete však použít libovolné oddělovače, dokonce i mezeru a datum se automaticky změní, aby se použily oddělovače, které odpovídají vašemu regionu.

trans-unit.source: Note that the format in which dates are displayed on printed reports or emailed documents is not influenced by your personal choice of region setting.

seg-source.mrk: Note that the format in which dates are displayed on printed reports or emailed documents is not influenced by your personal choice of region setting.

target.mrk: Nezapomeňte, že formát, ve kterém jsou data zobrazena v tištěných sestavách nebo e-mailech, není ovlivněn vaším osobním výběrem oblasti.

trans-unit.source: To work more productively with dates and times, you can use any of the methods or formats that are described in the following sections.

seg-source.mrk: To work more productively with dates and times, you can use any of the methods or formats that are described in the following sections.

target.mrk: Pro produktivnější práci s daty a časy můžete použít kteroukoli z metod nebo formátů, které jsou popsány v následujících částech.

trans-unit.source: Picking dates from the calendar

seg-source.mrk: Picking dates from the calendar

trans-unit.source: Any field displaying a calendar icon can be set using the calendar date picker.

seg-source.mrk: Any field displaying a calendar icon can be set using the calendar date picker.

target.mrk: Libovolné pole zobrazující ikonu kalendáře může být nastaveno pomocí výběru kalendářního data.

trans-unit.source: To display the calendar date picker, activate the calendar icon or press the Ctrl + Home keyboard shortcut in the field.

seg-source.mrk: To display the calendar date picker, activate the calendar icon or press the Ctrl + Home keyboard shortcut in the field.

target.mrk: Chcete-li zobrazit výběr data kalendáře, aktivujte ikonu kalendáře nebo v poli stiskněte klávesovou zkratku Ctrl + Home.

trans-unit.source: ![Date fields](media/ui-date-field.png "Example of a date field")

seg-source.mrk: ![Date fields](media/ui-date-field.png "Example of a date field")

trans-unit.source: See also [Keyboard Shortcuts in the calendar date picker](keyboard-shortcuts.md#calendarshortcuts)

seg-source.mrk: See also [Keyboard Shortcuts in the calendar date picker](keyboard-shortcuts.md#calendarshortcuts)

target.mrk: Viz také [Klávesové zkratky ve výběru dat v kalendáři](keyboard-shortcuts.md#calendarshortcuts)

trans-unit.source: Day\-week\-year pattern

seg-source.mrk: Day\-week\-year pattern

trans-unit.source: You can enter a date as a weekday followed by a week number and, optionally, a year.

seg-source.mrk: You can enter a date as a weekday followed by a week number and, optionally, a year.

target.mrk: Datum můžete zadat jako pracovní den následovaný číslem týdne a volitelně rokem.

trans-unit.source: For example, `Mon25` or `mon25` means Monday in week 25.

seg-source.mrk: For example, `Mon25` or `mon25` means Monday in week 25.

target.mrk: Například, `Mon25` nebo `mon25` znamená pondělí v 25. týdnu.

trans-unit.source: If you do not enter a year, the year of the work date is used.

seg-source.mrk: If you do not enter a year, the year of the work date is used.

target.mrk: Pokud nezadáte rok, použije se rok pracovního data.

trans-unit.source: Instead of entering the entire word for the day of the week, you can enter part of the word, starting from the beginning.

seg-source.mrk: Instead of entering the entire word for the day of the week, you can enter part of the word, starting from the beginning.

target.mrk: Místo zadávání celého slova pro den v týdnu můžete zadat část slova od začátku.

trans-unit.source: In case of conflicts (such as with `s` which could be Saturday or Sunday), the days are evaluated according to the region setting.

seg-source.mrk: In case of conflicts (such as with `s` which could be Saturday or Sunday), the days are evaluated according to the region setting.

target.mrk: V případě konfliktů (jako je to s `s`, kde se může jednat o sobotu nebo neděli) se dny vyhodnocují podle nastavení oblasti.

trans-unit.source: The input is first evaluated against `workdate` and `today` as well, so keep this in mind when abbreviating.

seg-source.mrk: The input is first evaluated against `workdate` and `today` as well, so keep this in mind when abbreviating.

target.mrk: Vstup je nejprve vyhodnocen proti `workdate` a také `today`, takže mějte toto na paměti při zkracování.

trans-unit.source: For example, `t` already means today, so it cannot mean Tuesday or Thursday.

seg-source.mrk: For example, `t` already means today, so it cannot mean Tuesday or Thursday.

target.mrk: Například, `t` již znamená dnes, takže to nemůže znamenat úterý nebo čtvrtek.

trans-unit.source: The week number scheme is always ISO 8601, where week 1 is the week with 4 January in it, or the week with the first Thursday of the year.

seg-source.mrk: The week number scheme is always ISO 8601, where week 1 is the week with 4 January in it, or the week with the first Thursday of the year.

target.mrk: Schéma čísla týdne je vždy ISO 8601, kde týden 1 je týden se 4. lednem v týdnu, nebo týden s prvním čtvrtkem roku.

trans-unit.source: Digit patterns

seg-source.mrk: Digit patterns

trans-unit.source: In a date field you can enter two, four, six, or eight digits:

seg-source.mrk: In a date field you can enter two, four, six, or eight digits:

target.mrk: Do datového pole můžete zadat dvě, čtyři, šest nebo osm číslic:

trans-unit.source: If you enter only two digits, this is interpreted as the day, and it will add the month and the year of the work date.

seg-source.mrk: If you enter only two digits, this is interpreted as the day, and it will add the month and the year of the work date.

target.mrk: Pokud zadáte pouze dvě číslice, bude to interpretováno jako den a přidá se měsíc a rok pracovního data.

trans-unit.source: If you enter four digits, this is interpreted as the day and the month, and it will add the year of the work date.

seg-source.mrk: If you enter four digits, this is interpreted as the day and the month, and it will add the year of the work date.

target.mrk: Pokud zadáte čtyři číslice, bude to interpretováno jako den a měsíc a přidá se rok pracovního data.

trans-unit.source: The order of the day and month is determined by your region settings.

seg-source.mrk: The order of the day and month is determined by your region settings.

target.mrk: Pořadí dne a měsíce je určeno nastavením vaší oblasti.

trans-unit.source: Even if your region settings have the year before the day and month, four digits are interpreted as the day and month.

seg-source.mrk: Even if your region settings have the year before the day and month, four digits are interpreted as the day and month.

target.mrk: I v případě, že má vaše nastavení oblasti rok před dnem a měsícem, čtyři číslice jsou interpretovány jako den a měsíc.

trans-unit.source: If the date you want to enter is in the range 01/01/1930 through 12/31/2029, you can enter the year with two digits; otherwise, enter the year with four digits.

seg-source.mrk: If the date you want to enter is in the range 01/01/1930 through 12/31/2029, you can enter the year with two digits; otherwise, enter the year with four digits.

target.mrk: Pokud je datum, které chcete zadat, v rozsahu 01/01/1930 až 31/31/2029, můžete zadat rok dvěma číslicemi; jinak zadejte rok čtyřmi číslicemi.

trans-unit.source: Today

seg-source.mrk: Today

trans-unit.source: Enter the word for `today`, in the language set by **Language** setting, that will set the date to the current date.

seg-source.mrk: Enter the word for `today`, in the language set by **Language** setting, that will set the date to the current date.

target.mrk: Zadejte slovo pro `today`, v jazyce nastaveném v nastavení **Jazyk** které nastaví datum na aktuální datum.

trans-unit.source: Instead of entering the entire word, you can enter part of the word, starting from the beginning, such as `t` or `tod`, as long as it is not also the start of another word.

seg-source.mrk: Instead of entering the entire word, you can enter part of the word, starting from the beginning, such as `t` or `tod`, as long as it is not also the start of another word.

target.mrk: Místo zadávání celého slova můžete zadat část slova, počínaje od začátku, například jako `t`, nebo `tod` , pokud to není také začátek jiného slova.

trans-unit.source: Period

seg-source.mrk: Period

trans-unit.source: To filter on a specific accounting period, in a date field enter the letter `p`, or the word `period`, followed by a number that identifies the accounting period, like `p2` or `period4`.

seg-source.mrk: To filter on a specific accounting period, in a date field enter the letter `p`, or the word `period`, followed by a number that identifies the accounting period, like `p2` or `period4`.

target.mrk: Chcete-li filtrovat konkrétní účetní období, zadejte do pole datum písmeno `p` nebo slovo `period` následováno číslem, které identifikuje účetní období, jako `p2` nebo `period4`.

trans-unit.source: The accounting period is relative to the fiscal year of the current work date that set in your Role Center.

seg-source.mrk: The accounting period is relative to the fiscal year of the current work date that set in your Role Center.

target.mrk: Účetní období je relativní k fiskálnímu roku aktuálního pracovního data, který je nastaven v Centru rolí.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the work date is **03/21/20**, then `p1`, or just `p`, filters on the first accounting period of the fiscal year 2020 (such as `01/01/20..01/31/20`).

seg-source.mrk: For example, if the work date is **03/21/20**, then `p1`, or just `p`, filters on the first accounting period of the fiscal year 2020 (such as `01/01/20..01/31/20`).

target.mrk: Například pokud je pracovní datum **03/21/20**, pak `p1` nebo jen `p` filtruje za první účetní období fiskálního roku 2020 (například `01/01/20..01/31/20`).

trans-unit.source: `p15` filters on the fifteenth accounting period from the start of fiscal year 2020 (such as `03/01/21..03/31/21`).

seg-source.mrk: filters on the fifteenth accounting period from the start of fiscal year 2020 (such as `03/01/21..03/31/21`).

target.mrk: filtruje za patnácté účetní období od začátku fiskálního roku 2020 (například `03/01/21..03/31/21`).

trans-unit.source: The accounting periods are defined on the **Accounting Periods** page.

seg-source.mrk: The accounting periods are defined on the **Accounting Periods** page.

target.mrk: Účetní období jsou definována na stránce **Účetní období**.

trans-unit.source: To view or change the accounting periods, open the page [here](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com/?page=100).

seg-source.mrk: To view or change the accounting periods, open the page [here](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com/?page=100).

target.mrk: Chcete-li zobrazit nebo změnit účetní období, otevřete stránku [zde](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com/?page=100).

trans-unit.source: Current work date

seg-source.mrk: Current work date

trans-unit.source: The work date feature allows you to record transactions using a date that is different from the current date.

seg-source.mrk: The work date feature allows you to record transactions using a date that is different from the current date.

target.mrk: Funkce pracovního data umožňuje zaznamenávat transakce pomocí data, které se liší od aktuálního data.

trans-unit.source: The word for 'workdate', in the language set by **Language** setting, will set the date to the currently set work date that is specified on the [**My Settings**](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com?page=9176 "Go directly to your user settings page in Business Central") page.

seg-source.mrk: The word for 'workdate', in the language set by **Language** setting, will set the date to the currently set work date that is specified on the [**My Settings**](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com?page=9176 "Go directly to your user settings page in Business Central") page.

target.mrk: Slovo pro „pracovní datum“ v jazyce nastaveném v nastavení **Jazyk** nastaví datum na aktuálně nastavené pracovní datum, které je zadáno na stránce[**Má nastavení**](https://businesscentral.dynamics.com?page=9176 "Přejděte přímo na stránku s uživatelskými nastaveními v Business Central")

trans-unit.source: Instead of entering the entire word, you can enter part of the word, starting from the beginning, such as 'w' or 'work'.

seg-source.mrk: Instead of entering the entire word, you can enter part of the word, starting from the beginning, such as 'w' or 'work'.

target.mrk: Místo zadávání celého slova můžete zadat část slova počínaje od začátku, například „p“ nebo „pracovní“.

trans-unit.source: If you have not defined a work date, the current date will be used as the work date.

seg-source.mrk: If you have not defined a work date, the current date will be used as the work date.

target.mrk: Pokud jste nedefinovali pracovní datum, použije se jako pracovní datum aktuální datum.

trans-unit.source: You may want to use a work date if you have many transactions with a date other than today's date.

seg-source.mrk: You may want to use a work date if you have many transactions with a date other than today's date.

target.mrk: Možná budete chtít použít pracovní datum, pokud máte mnoho transakcí s jiným než dnešním datem.

trans-unit.source: See also [Changing Basic Settings, such as the Work Date](ui-change-basic-settings.md#work-date).

seg-source.mrk: See also [Changing Basic Settings, such as the Work Date](ui-change-basic-settings.md#work-date).

target.mrk: Viz také [Změna základních nastavení, například pracovního data](ui-change-basic-settings.md#work-date).

trans-unit.source: Closing Date

seg-source.mrk: Closing Date

trans-unit.source: When you close a fiscal year, you can use closing dates to indicate that an entry is a closing entry.

seg-source.mrk: When you close a fiscal year, you can use closing dates to indicate that an entry is a closing entry.

target.mrk: Když uzavřete fiskální rok, můžete použít data uzávěrky k označení, že položka je položkou uzávěrky.

trans-unit.source: A closing date technically is between two dates, for example between Dec 31 and Jan 1.

seg-source.mrk: A closing date technically is between two dates, for example between Dec 31 and Jan 1.

target.mrk: Datum uzávěrky je technicky mezi dvěma daty, například mezi 31. prosincem a 1. lednem.

trans-unit.source: To specify that a date is a closing date, put `C` just before the date, such as `C123101`.

seg-source.mrk: To specify that a date is a closing date, put `C` just before the date, such as `C123101`.

target.mrk: Chcete-li určit, že datum je datum uzávěrky, vložte `C` těsně před datum, například `C123101`.

trans-unit.source: This can be used in combination with all the date patterns.

seg-source.mrk: This can be used in combination with all the date patterns.

target.mrk: To lze použít v kombinaci se všemi datovými vzory.

trans-unit.source: Examples

seg-source.mrk: Examples

trans-unit.source: The following table contains examples of dates using all the formats.

seg-source.mrk: The following table contains examples of dates using all the formats.

target.mrk: Následující tabulka obsahuje příklady dat ve všech formátech.

trans-unit.source: It assumes region settings that format dates according to: **year.month.day.**, a week starting on Monday, and the English language.

seg-source.mrk: It assumes region settings that format dates according to: **year.month.day.**, a week starting on Monday, and the English language.

target.mrk: Předpokládá nastavení oblasti, které formátuje data podle: **rok.měsíc.den.**, týden začínající v pondělí a anglický jazyk.

trans-unit.source: Setting Ranges

seg-source.mrk: Setting Ranges

trans-unit.source: On lists, totals and reports, you can set filters on dates, times and datetimes containing a start value and optionally an end value to display only the data contained in that range.

seg-source.mrk: On lists, totals and reports, you can set filters on dates, times and datetimes containing a start value and optionally an end value to display only the data contained in that range.

target.mrk: V seznamech, součtech a sestavách můžete nastavit filtry podle dat, časů a datových časů obsahujících počáteční hodnotu a případně koncovou hodnotu tak, aby zobrazovala pouze data obsažená v tomto rozsahu.

trans-unit.source: The standard rules apply to the way you set date ranges.

seg-source.mrk: The standard rules apply to the way you set date ranges.

target.mrk: Pro způsob nastavování časových období platí standardní pravidla.

trans-unit.source: **Meaning**

seg-source.mrk: Meaning

trans-unit.source: **Sample expression (Date)**

seg-source.mrk: Sample expression (Date)

trans-unit.source: **Data included in the filter**

seg-source.mrk: Data included in the filter

trans-unit.source: Interval

seg-source.mrk: Interval

trans-unit.source: Records with dates between and including 12 15 00 and 01 15 01.

seg-source.mrk: Records with dates between and including 12 15 00 and 01 15 01.

target.mrk: Záznamy s daty mezi a včetně 12 15 00 a 01 15 01.

trans-unit.source: Records with dates of 12 15 00 or earlier.

seg-source.mrk: Records with dates of 12 15 00 or earlier.

trans-unit.source: Date range that includes the second, third, and fourth accounting periods, such as `01/01/20..04/30/20`.

seg-source.mrk: Date range that includes the second, third, and fourth accounting periods, such as `01/01/20..04/30/20`.

target.mrk: Časové období, které zahrnuje druhé, třetí a čtvrté účetní období, například `01/01/20..04/30/20`.

trans-unit.source: Either/or

seg-source.mrk: Either/or

trans-unit.source: Records with dates of either 12 15 00 or 12 16 00.

seg-source.mrk: Records with dates of either 12 15 00 or 12 16 00.

trans-unit.source: If there are records with dates on both days, they will all be displayed.

seg-source.mrk: If there are records with dates on both days, they will all be displayed.

target.mrk: Pokud jsou záznamy s daty v obou dnech, zobrazí se všechny.

trans-unit.source: Combination

seg-source.mrk: Combination

trans-unit.source: Records with dates of 12 15 00 or on dates between and including 12 01 00 and 12 10 00.

seg-source.mrk: Records with dates of 12 15 00 or on dates between and including 12 01 00 and 12 10 00.

target.mrk: Záznamy s daty 12 15 00 nebo s daty mezi 12 01 00 a 12 10 00 včetně.

trans-unit.source: \nRecords with dates of 12 14 00 or earlier, or dates of 12 30 00 or later, that is, all records except those with dates between and including 12 15 00 and 12 29 00.

seg-source.mrk: \nRecords with dates of 12 14 00 or earlier, or dates of 12 30 00 or later, that is, all records except those with dates between and including 12 15 00 and 12 29 00.

target.mrk: \n Záznamy s daty 12 14 00 nebo dřívějšími nebo daty 12 30 00 nebo novějšími, tj. všechny záznamy s výjimkou těch, které mají data mezi 12 15 00 a 12 29 00 včetně.

trans-unit.source: You can use any of the valid formats in date range filters.

seg-source.mrk: You can use any of the valid formats in date range filters.

target.mrk: Ve filtrech rozsahu dat můžete použít kterýkoli z platných formátů.

trans-unit.source: For example, `mon14 3..t 4p` applied on a datetime field results in a filter from 3 AM on Monday in week 14 of the current work date year, inclusive, until today at 4PM, inclusive.

seg-source.mrk: For example, `mon14 3..t 4p` applied on a datetime field results in a filter from 3 AM on Monday in week 14 of the current work date year, inclusive, until today at 4PM, inclusive.

target.mrk: Například `mon14 3..t 4p` aplikovaný na pole dat a časů bude výsledkem filtru od 3:00 v pondělí 14. týdnu aktuálního roku pracovního data, včetně, dodnes, do 16:00, včetně.

trans-unit.source: Using Date Formulas

seg-source.mrk: Using Date Formulas

trans-unit.source: A date formula is a short, abbreviated combination of letters and numbers that specifies how to calculate dates.

seg-source.mrk: A date formula is a short, abbreviated combination of letters and numbers that specifies how to calculate dates.

target.mrk: Vzorec data je krátká, zkrácená kombinace písmen a číslic, která určuje, jak vypočítat data.

trans-unit.source: You can enter date formulas in various date calculation fields or filters.

seg-source.mrk: You can enter date formulas in various date calculation fields or filters.

target.mrk: Vzorce data můžete zadat do různých výpočetních polí nebo filtrů.

trans-unit.source: In all data formula fields, one day is automatically included to cover today as the day when the period starts.

seg-source.mrk: In all data formula fields, one day is automatically included to cover today as the day when the period starts.

target.mrk: Ve všech polích se vzorcem je jeden ze dnů automaticky zahrnut jako den, kdy začíná účetní období.

trans-unit.source: Accordingly, for example, if you enter `1W`, then the period is actually eight days because today is included.

seg-source.mrk: Accordingly, for example, if you enter `1W`, then the period is actually eight days because today is included.

target.mrk: Podle toho například, pokud zadáte `1W`, pak období je ve skutečnosti osm dní, protože je zahrnutý i dnešek.

trans-unit.source: To specify a period of seven days \(one true week\) including the period starting date, then you must enter `6D` or `1W-1D`.

seg-source.mrk: To specify a period of seven days \(one true week\) including the period starting date, then you must enter `6D` or `1W-1D`.

target.mrk: Chcete-li určit období sedmi dnů \(skutečný týden\) včetně data začátku období, musíte zadat `6D` nebo `1W-1D`.

trans-unit.source: Here are some examples of how date formulas can be used:

seg-source.mrk: Here are some examples of how date formulas can be used:

target.mrk: Zde je několik příkladů, jak lze použít vzorce dat:

trans-unit.source: The date formula in the recurring frequency field in recurring journals determines how often the entry on the journal line will be posted.

seg-source.mrk: The date formula in the recurring frequency field in recurring journals determines how often the entry on the journal line will be posted.

target.mrk: Vzorec data v poli opakující se frekvence v periodických denících určuje, jak často bude položka na řádku deníku zaúčtována.

trans-unit.source: The date formula in the **Grace Period** field for a specified reminder level determines the period of time that must pass from the due date \(or from the date of the previous reminder\) before a reminder will be created.

seg-source.mrk: The date formula in the **Grace Period** field for a specified reminder level determines the period of time that must pass from the due date \(or from the date of the previous reminder\) before a reminder will be created.

target.mrk: Vzorec data v poli **Lhůta odkladu** pro určenou úroveň upomínky určuje časové období, které musí uplynout od data splatnosti \(nebo od data předchozí upomínky\), než bude upomínka vytvořena.

trans-unit.source: The date formula in the **Due Date Calculation** field determines how to calculate the due date on the reminder.

seg-source.mrk: The date formula in the **Due Date Calculation** field determines how to calculate the due date on the reminder.

target.mrk: Vzorec data v poli **Výpočet splatnosti** určuje, jak vypočítat datum splatnosti na upomínce.

trans-unit.source: The date formula can contain a maximum of 20 characters, both numbers and letters.

seg-source.mrk: The date formula can contain a maximum of 20 characters, both numbers and letters.

target.mrk: Vzorec data může obsahovat maximálně 20 znaků,spolu číslic i písmen.

trans-unit.source: You can use the following letters, which are abbreviations for calendar units.

seg-source.mrk: You can use the following letters, which are abbreviations for calendar units.

target.mrk: Můžete použít následující písmena, což jsou zkratky pro kalendářové jednotky.

trans-unit.source: Letter

seg-source.mrk: Letter

trans-unit.source: Meaning

seg-source.mrk: Meaning

trans-unit.source: Current

seg-source.mrk: Current

trans-unit.source: Day\(s\)

seg-source.mrk: Day\(s

trans-unit.source: Week\(s\)

seg-source.mrk: Week\(s

trans-unit.source: Month\(s\)

seg-source.mrk: Month\(s

trans-unit.source: Quarter\(s\)

seg-source.mrk: Quarter\(s

trans-unit.source: Year\(s\)

seg-source.mrk: Year\(s

trans-unit.source: You can construct a date formula in three ways.

seg-source.mrk: You can construct a date formula in three ways.

target.mrk: Vzorec data můžete vytvořit třemi způsoby.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use `C`, for current, and a time unit.

seg-source.mrk: The following example shows how to use `C`, for current, and a time unit.

target.mrk: Následující příklad ukazuje, jak používat `C`, pro aktuální a časovou jednotku.

seg-source.mrk: Current week

seg-source.mrk: The following example shows how to use a number and a time unit.

target.mrk: Následující příklad ukazuje, jak používat číslo a časovou jednotku.

trans-unit.source: A number cannot be larger than 9999.

seg-source.mrk: A number cannot be larger than 9999.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how you can combine these three forms as needed.

seg-source.mrk: The following example shows how you can combine these three forms as needed.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how you can use a minus sign to indicate a date in the past.

seg-source.mrk: The following example shows how you can use a minus sign to indicate a date in the past.

trans-unit.source: 1 year ago from today

seg-source.mrk: 1 year ago from today

trans-unit.source: If the location uses a base calendar, then the date formula that you enter in, for example, the **Shipping Time** field is interpreted according to the calendar working days.

seg-source.mrk: If the location uses a base calendar, then the date formula that you enter in, for example, the **Shipping Time** field is interpreted according to the calendar working days.

target.mrk: Pokud lokace používá základní kalendář, pak se vzorec data, který zadáte, například pole **Doba dodávky**, interpretuje podle pracovních dnů kalendáře.

trans-unit.source: For example, `1W` means seven working days.

seg-source.mrk: For example, `1W` means seven working days.

trans-unit.source: Entering Times

seg-source.mrk: Entering Times

trans-unit.source: When you enter times, you can insert any non-space separators that you want between the units, but if you use double digits for each unit up to milliseconds, then it is not required.

seg-source.mrk: When you enter times, you can insert any non-space separators that you want between the units, but if you use double digits for each unit up to milliseconds, then it is not required.

target.mrk: Když zadáváte časy, můžete mezi jednotky vložit libovolné bezmezerové oddělovače, které chcete, ale pokud pro každou jednotku až do milisekund použijete dvojciferné číslice, není to nutné.

trans-unit.source: You only have to write the largest units that you require; the rest will be set to zero.

seg-source.mrk: You only have to write the largest units that you require; the rest will be set to zero.

target.mrk: Musíte pouze napsat největší jednotky, které vyžadujete; zbytek bude nastaven na nulu.

trans-unit.source: You can also leave out any AM/PM indicator.

seg-source.mrk: You can also leave out any AM/PM indicator.

target.mrk: Můžete také vynechat jakýkoli indikátor AM / PM.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the various ways in which times can be entered and how they are interpreted.

seg-source.mrk: The following table lists the various ways in which times can be entered and how they are interpreted.

target.mrk: V následující tabulce jsou uvedeny různé způsoby zadávání časů a jejich interpretace.

trans-unit.source: It assumes region settings that format times according to: **Hours:Minutes:Seconds.Milliseconds.**

seg-source.mrk: It assumes region settings that format times according to:
Hours:Minutes:Seconds.Milliseconds.

target.mrk: Předpokládá nastavení oblasti, které formátuje časy podle:

trans-unit.source: and use the AM and PM indicators of 'AM' and 'PM', respectively.

seg-source.mrk: and use the AM and PM indicators of 'AM' and 'PM', respectively.

target.mrk: a používá ukazatele AM a PM pro „AM“ a „PM“.

trans-unit.source: **Entry**

seg-source.mrk: Entry

trans-unit.source: **Interpretation**

seg-source.mrk: Interpretation

trans-unit.source: You should be aware that milliseconds are interpreted as decimal notation.

seg-source.mrk: You should be aware that milliseconds are interpreted as decimal notation.

target.mrk: Měli byste si být vědomi, že milisekundy jsou interpretovány jako desítkový zápis.

trans-unit.source: So, for example, `3`, `30`, and `300` all mean 300 milliseconds, while `03` means `30` and `003` means 3 milliseconds.

seg-source.mrk: So, for example, `3`, `30`, and `300` all mean 300 milliseconds, while `03` means `30` and `003` means 3 milliseconds.

target.mrk: Takže například `3`, `30` a `300` všechny znamenají 300 milisekund, zatímco `03` znamená `30` a `003` znamená 3 milisekundy.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use `24:00` to mean midnight, or use any value greater than 24:00.

seg-source.mrk: You cannot use `24:00` to mean midnight, or use any value greater than 24:00.

target.mrk: Nemůžete použít `24:00` pro půlnoc nebo použít jakoukoli hodnotu větší než 24:00.

trans-unit.source: The word for 'time' in the language used by [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] will be evaluated to the current time on your computer or mobile device.

seg-source.mrk: The word for 'time' in the language used by [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] will be evaluated to the current time on your computer or mobile device.

target.mrk: Slovo pro „čas“ v jazyce používaném v [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_long_md.md)] bude vyhodnoceno na aktuální čas ve vašem počítači nebo mobilním zařízení.

trans-unit.source: You can enter any part of the word, starting from the beginning, such as `t` or `TIM`.

seg-source.mrk: You can enter any part of the word, starting from the beginning, such as `t` or `TIM`.

target.mrk: Můžete zadat libovolnou část slova počínaje od začátku, například `t` nebo `TIM`.

trans-unit.source: Entering combined Dates and Times

seg-source.mrk: Entering combined Dates and Times

trans-unit.source: When you enter datetimes, which are a date and time combined into one field, you must enter a space between the date and the time.

seg-source.mrk: When you enter datetimes, which are a date and time combined into one field, you must enter a space between the date and the time.

target.mrk: Když zadáte Datum/čas, které jsou kombinací data a času v jednom poli, musíte vložit mezeru mezi datem a časem.

trans-unit.source: The date part can only contain spaces in the form of the official date separator of your region settings.

seg-source.mrk: The date part can only contain spaces in the form of the official date separator of your region settings.

target.mrk: Část data může obsahovat pouze mezery ve formě oficiálního oddělovače data vašeho nastavení oblasti.

trans-unit.source: The time can contain spaces around the AM/PM indicator.

seg-source.mrk: The time can contain spaces around the AM/PM indicator.

target.mrk: Čas může obsahovat mezery kolem ukazatele AM / PM.

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to enter only a date in a datetime field, but it is not possible to enter only a time.

seg-source.mrk: It is also possible to enter only a date in a datetime field, but it is not possible to enter only a time.

target.mrk: Je také možné zadat pouze datum do pole Datum/čas, ale není možné zadat pouze čas.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists some examples of date/time combinations.

seg-source.mrk: The following table lists some examples of date/time combinations.

target.mrk: V následující tabulce jsou uvedeny některé příklady kombinací data a času.

trans-unit.source: The region settings in the examples displays dates in the day\-month\-year format, using AM/PM designators, English language, and Sunday as the start of the week.

seg-source.mrk: The region settings in the examples displays dates in the day\-month\-year format, using AM/PM designators, English language, and Sunday as the start of the week.

target.mrk: Nastavení oblasti v příkladech zobrazuje data ve formátu den\-měsíc\-rok, s použitím označení AM / PM, anglického jazyka a neděle jako začátku týdne.

trans-unit.source: Entering Duration

seg-source.mrk: Entering Duration

trans-unit.source: Some fields in the application represent a duration, or amount of elapsed time, instead of a specific date or time.

seg-source.mrk: Some fields in the application represent a duration, or amount of elapsed time, instead of a specific date or time.

target.mrk: Některá pole v aplikaci představují dobu trvání nebo množství uplynulého času namísto konkrétního data nebo času.

trans-unit.source: You enter a duration as a number followed by its unit of measure.

seg-source.mrk: You enter a duration as a number followed by its unit of measure.

target.mrk: Dobu trvání zadáte jako číslo následované jeho měrnou jednotkou.

trans-unit.source: Here are some examples.

seg-source.mrk: Here are some examples.

trans-unit.source: **Duration**

seg-source.mrk: Duration

trans-unit.source: **Unit of measure**

seg-source.mrk: Unit of measure

trans-unit.source: 2 hrs

seg-source.mrk: 2 hrs

trans-unit.source: 6 hrs 30 mins

seg-source.mrk: 6 hrs 30 mins

trans-unit.source: 6 hrs 30 mins

seg-source.mrk: 6 hrs 30 mins

trans-unit.source: 1 hr 30 mins

seg-source.mrk: 1 hr 30 mins

trans-unit.source: 2 days 6 hrs 30 mins

seg-source.mrk: 2 days 6 hrs 30 mins

trans-unit.source: 2 days 6 hrs 30 mins 56 secs 600 msecs

seg-source.mrk: 2 days 6 hrs 30 mins 56 secs 600 msecs

trans-unit.source: You can also enter a number, which will be automatically converted to a duration.

seg-source.mrk: You can also enter a number, which will be automatically converted to a duration.

target.mrk: Můžete také zadat číslo, které bude automaticky převedeno na dobu trvání.

trans-unit.source: The number you enter is converted according to the default unit of measure that has been specified for the duration field.

seg-source.mrk: The number you enter is converted according to the default unit of measure that has been specified for the duration field.

target.mrk: Zadané číslo se převede podle výchozí měrné jednotky, která byla zadána pro pole trvání.

trans-unit.source: To see what unit of measure is being used in a duration field, enter a number and see which unit of measure it is converted to.

seg-source.mrk: To see what unit of measure is being used in a duration field, enter a number and see which unit of measure it is converted to.

target.mrk: Chcete-li vidět, jaká měrná jednotka se používá v poli doby trvání, zadejte číslo a podívejte se, na kterou měrnou jednotku se převede.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the unit of measure is hours, the number `5` is converted to 5 hrs.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if the unit of measure is hours, the number `5` is converted to 5 hrs.

target.mrk: Například pokud jsou měrnou jednotkou hodiny, číslo `5` se převede na 5 hodin.
